page.title: 18FARMING.
page.content:
Hedge End Farm covers most of this area. The remainder is Crown Land bought from the estate of the Portman family. All this land is let.
Hedge End Farm is owned by Prudential Insurance, who are trying to sell it for three_quarters of a million pounds. The farm was bought from a family and divided into three farms. The son of the previous owner now owns the North Barn portion, a sister lives on this land in a large stone_built house. The farm manager took over three years ago. He lives in part of the main house. The house is Victorian, well_ maintained and has a swimming pool. There are five tied cottages and there is also a pair of houses for sale.
